title: Binary Puzzle
description:
Computers think in binary (0s and 1s). Convert this binary string to ASCII text:

`01100110011011000110000101100111011110110110001001101001011011100110000101110010011110010011100101101111011011000111010101100101`

**Hint:** Group the bits into 8-bit chunks (bytes) and convert each to decimal, then to ASCII characters.
